articles.description: Four months is a long time especially in the world of technology where trends change in a jiffy. Instant messaging apps aren’t a new trend and which is why Telegram’s leap to become the most-downloaded app in the world is quite a story. Not that Telegram was …
articles.content: Four months is a long time especially in the world of technology where trends change in a jiffy. Instant messaging apps arent a new trend and which is why Telegrams leap to become the most-downloaded… [+2223 chars]
